mapper.insert: insert into t_pic (path, pid, pname, pcreatime, GPS_Longitude, GPS_Latitude, pwidth, pheight, psize, plabel, pdesc) values (#{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcreatime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gpsLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gpsLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwidth,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pheight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{psize,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{plabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdesc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

update t_pic
